Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.serialize

Class SerializerImpl

Object
SerializerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializer
public final class SerializerImpl extends Object implements Serializer
Framework class for automatically creating Serializers for SerializableStateImpl subclasses. Each subclass of SerializableStateImpl should add a statement like 
       registerSerializers(MySerializableState.class);
to the no-argument version of registerSerializers(). This latter method is invoked by the static initializer of SerializerFactory.
Since:
1.1

    • permitsSubclasses

      public boolean permitsSubclasses()
      Description copied from interface: Serializer
      Returns true if and only if it is legal for this Serializer to be used to serialize a subclass. In general this method should return false, i.e., a specific Serializer should be registered explicitly for each class. In some cases this is however not expedient. An example of this is a Serializer of classes created by a factory class: the exact subclasses may not be known but sufficient information may be able to be extracted from the subclass instance to permit its serialization by the Serializer registered for the factory class.
      Specified by:
      permitsSubclasses in interface Serializer
